name: Le renne déneige
description:
During his delivery, Santa Claus crashed into a mountain. As Santa's reindeer, help him bring back the gifts stuck in the snow while he fixes the sleigh.

This game was made for the gamejam "Jam de l'Avent 2022" with a global theme of Christmas and a specific theme "Stuck in the rock".

Game made with Godot Engine and PixelOver for pre-render the 3D models to pixel art.

By Deakcor
